name: Clock Cycles
description:
Legends tell of a skilled chronomancer who kept the secret of time itself locked away in his impenetrable clock tower. All of the tower's doors are fated to open just once, for a single second. Only by using the devices within to create closed cycles of time is it possible to enter the doors and reach the top.

Controls: Arrow keys/WASD to move, Z/Space to interact, R to rewind.

The browser version works best in Chrome, and may not run in other browsers.

Made in 100 hours for Extra Credits Game Jam #3, with the theme "Cycles."
